PSoC 6 Peripheral Driver Library
API Reference
IPC driver layer (IPC_DRV)
IPC (Inter Process Communication)

General Description

The functions of this layer are used in the higher IPC levels (Semaphores and Pipes).

Users are not expected to call any of these IPC functions directly (cy_ipc_drv.h). Instead include either of cy_ipc_sema.h or cy_ipc_pipe.h. Alternatively include cy_pdl.h to get access to all functions and declarations in the PDL.

 Macro definitions are used in the driver.
